messages.title: Re-elect Ian Murray
messages.content: In just a few weeks, you will have a clear choice in South Edinburgh. Do we continue with five more years of the Tories in government, or do we elect a Labour Government with a clear plan to make life better for people?

mentions.tacticalSituation: Ian Murray won this seat with a majority of just 316 votes. Your vote matters in this election, because we need outstanding MPs, like Ian Murray, who work hard locally and so that Labour can win the election and carry out our plans in government.

issues.economy: better pay and more secure work

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Kirkcaldy and Cowdenbeath

images.caption: Rt. Hon. Gordon Brown MP, Member of Parliament for Kirkcaldy and Cowdenbeath

leaflet.additionalNotes: Join me in Edinburgh on Saturday 28 March 2015 at 12pm to hear why we need to re-elect Ian.
